text: Hey all! If anyone has found any tips around working with amp styling in blog posts, would you  mind sharing your thoughts in this thread: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Content-Design-Questions/Edit-AMP-style-and-remove-post-author/m-p/218863/highlight/false#M9975>? Thank you and happy friday!!
AMP page styles cannot yet be customized outside of the blog amp customizer as far as I can tell
Has anyone had any experience with using the knowledge base software? I just want to know if there is a way to have a custom template for it.

Happy friday! if anyone has any knowledge about working with gifs in responsive design, we would love your thoughts on this thread: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Email-Marketing/Responsive-Animated-gif-size/m-p/218956>
